q: Former Republican state Mike Pence Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Mike Pence Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for Eric Holcomb . I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
